mapper.select: select * from equipmentManagement where status='대기' order by equipment_no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into file(equipment_no,file_date,file_name) values((select max(equipment_no) from equipmentManagement),#{file_date},#{file_name})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( (select file_name from file where equipment_no=#{equipment_no}) ,'no') AS file_name
select * from equipmentManagement where status='승인' order by approval_date desc limit #{pageStart},${pageSize}
select count(equipment_no) from equipmentManagement where status='승인'
select * from equipmentManagement where status='반려' order by reject_date desc limit #{pageStart},${pageSize}
select count(equipment_no) from equipmentManagement where status='반려'
mapper.update: update equipmentManagement set report_date=#{report_date}, e_repair_type=#{e_repair_type}, field=#{field}, equipment_name=#{equipment_name}, manufacturer=#{manufacturer},count=#{count},cost=#{cost},total=#{count}*#{cost},repair_reason=#{repair_reason} where equipment_no=#{equipment_no} and status ='대기'
